content.webTitle: Guardian Unlimited up for a Webby

fields.headline: Guardian Unlimited up for a Webby
fields.bodyText: "We're delighted to announce that Guardian Unlimited has been nominated for a Webby award. We're the only British site shortlisted in the newspaper category alongside three American big boys (the New York Times, Wall Street Journal and Washington Post) and the US entertainment paper Variety," reports our very own Newsblog.
